<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get Agent Calibration"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/board-meeting/agent-calibration/{agent_name}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Get calibration metrics for a specific agent.

Returns calibration metrics including:
- ECE (Expected Calibration Error) - fixed-width binning
- ACE (Adaptive Calibration Error) - equal-count binning (primary metric)
- Brier Score - proper scoring rule
- Bootstrap 95% confidence interval for ECE
- Bin diagnostics with sparse bin warnings

Status thresholds (based on ACE):
- good: ACE &lt; 0.05
- warning: 0.05 &lt; ACE &lt; 0.10
- poor: ACE > 0.10
- insufficient_data: &lt; 10 predictions with outcomes
